Experimental data from TGA experiments.
Sample material is powdered black cast poly methyl methacrylate (PMMA).
The experiments were conducted with a Mettler Toledo TGA/DSC 3+.
Various constant heating rate were used to conduct the TGA experimensts.
The full data with different sample masses and sample configurations
can be found here:
Armbrust, F., Zehfuß, J., Riese, O., 2025. Thermogravimetric And Microscale Calorimeter Data on Cast PMMA.
https://doi.org/10.24355/dbbs.084-202504170956-0

The data set was used for the following manuscript:
Armbrust, F., Hehnen, T., Zehfuß, J., Riese, O., Arnold, L., 2025. Discrepancies and Experimental Influences in Micro-Scale Measurements for Kinetic Modelling. 
https://doi.org/10.24355/dbbs.084-202507041233-0
